title: Please Don't 429 Me
description: A deep dive into building a resilient, cost-aware, and self-healing LLM request router that intelligently manages multiple API subscriptions across Azure, Anthropic, Google, and xAI to avoid rate limits.

title: Azure Claude 4.5 + OpenAI Agents SDK Compatibility Patch
description: A monkey-patch solution to run the OpenAI Agents SDK with Azure AI Foundry's Claude Sonnet 4.5 endpoint.

title: Understanding Transformers - From Attention to GPT
description: A technical deep dive into the transformer architecture that revolutionized NLP and gave rise to modern large language models.

title: Docker Best Practices
description: A production-ready guide to building efficient, secure, and maintainable Docker containers.
